root.name: Die Hard: Vendetta
root.description: StoryTaking place five years after the Die Hard: With a Vengeance, you play as John McClane, a New York detective. Your daughter, Lucy joins the police force and soon after she is kidnapped by a group of terrorists, whose leader is Piet Gruber, the son of Hans Gruber (the villain from the first film). It is your job again to defeat the terrorists.
